title: Parent engagement
description: Platforms and tools for parent engagement

body.raw:
<Callout>

This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page or broken links, it means we're still working on it!

</Callout>

## Communications

* Email Newsletter Editor (with Principal and Parent Coordinator)
* Konstella/GDrive/IT Administrator
* Web Content
* Digital Design (social media)
* Events Calendar
* Photography

## Email Newsletter Guidelines

### Deadlines

* Everything should be held for the Monday school newsletter unless it is an emergency or the deadline is within 1 day.
